title: Stacey Solomon races to tidy messy house strewn with clothes, leftover food and nappies
text:

Loose Women star Stacey Solomon documented her rush to get her house in order before she and her three boys needed to catch their flight to the Maldives.

The supermum, who's a fan favourite on the Loose Women panel for her honesty, showed her 2.3 million followers a bunch of open suitcases and some boxes as well as a pile of uneaten fish and chips.

The 29 year-old panned the camera across the daunting looking mess, writing: "12 hours until we have to leave and I don't know how I've allowed this to happen. I'm disgusting."

She soon rolled up her sleeves and cranked up the music volume as she tackled the mess one step at a time and in fabulous style to S Club 7's Don't Stop Movin.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Stacey's danced about her living room singing into her remote control and soon enough she was packed and ready to jet off for their luxury getway.

She laughed in the caption: "Need some motivation to get this done...yep still need to scrub my tan face."

Before and after snaps also showed off her impressive work.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She's also given fans a glimpse into her holiday, and while there's no sign of her partner Joe Swash, they look to be having a whale of a time.

Baby Rex, her first child with Joe, even slept through the whole night after they made it to the paradise resort, with Stacey saying she was astonished when she saw her clock read 8am.

She always been candid about her experiences as a mum, including "crippling mum guilt" and anxiety after giving birth to Rex back in May.

She's now a solid fixture of the Loose Women panel after winning fans' hearts with her genuine, down-to-earth attitude.

Joe, meanwhile, is training hard for 2020's series of Dancing On Ice.
description: Stacey had just 12 hours to get everything in the house sorted before she and her boys had to fly to the Maldives
